common_issues.title: Pieces OS and application performance issues
common_issues.description: Users report the Pieces desktop application and OS being slow, unresponsive, or not launching on Windows.  LLMs are also failing to provide complete or correct code. Troubleshooting may include checking system resources, reinstalling the application, or ensuring the latest OS version.

common_issues.title: Copilot struggles to access and utilize workstream activities
common_issues.description: Users report Copilot failing to locate or interact correctly with workstream activities, especially when generating daily work reports or updating past tasks.  The issue appears across macOS and potentially Windows platforms, affecting Copilot's ability to process time ranges and access data from multiple activities.  One user mentioned success when using the 'start copilot chat' within a specific activity, suggesting a potential workaround.

related_issues.title: Copilot doesn't use workstream activities properly.(It can't find data)
related_issues.text:
Copilot doesn't use workstream activities properly.(It can't find data)
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

macOS

### Your Pieces OS Version

4.2.1

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

Last week, I used the copilot for creating report of the day's work logs.
It worked properly but I doesn't work since yesterday(I don't know the issue starts from yesterday but I detected it on yesterday)

Copliot can't find the activities in workstream and It doesn't care about time range selection.

It works when using 'start copilot chat' button in specific activity, but can't use with multiple activities.

I hope to use it for creating daily work report everyday.

- requested today's daily work report

- requested today's daily work report using english

common_issues.title: Pieces OS slow performance and unresponsiveness
common_issues.description: Users report slow performance and unresponsiveness in the Pieces desktop app and VS Code extension, especially after updates or sending multiple messages to Copilot.  Symptoms include lag, delayed responses, and high CPU/RAM usage. Some users experience complete application failure. Troubleshooting steps like hard reset haven't resolved the issue.  A common error message related to a missing publisher model is also reported.

Pieces desktop application is working very much slow after latest update, takes very much time to give any response. Even after doing a hard reset active runtime, it just do not work. 
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

related_issues.title: UI in Pieces OS for VS Code is extremely slow after sending several messages
related_issues.text:
UI in Pieces OS for VS Code is extremely slow after sending several messages
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application, VS Code, Pieces OS

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

12.0.0

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

After sending several messages to Pieces Copilot in the extension for VS Code, there is a significant performance drop to the program which leads to the app eventually becoming extremely slow and difficult to use when pressing buttons, using keyboard input, and the speed of which a LLM responds. CPU usage and RAM usage also spikes when this occurs.
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

common_issues.title: Pieces app on Windows crashes/slows, OS fails to start
common_issues.description: Multiple users report Pieces for Windows crashing when moving between screens or scrolling, especially with version 12.  Others report extreme slowness/unresponsiveness.  Additionally, Pieces OS fails to launch for some users even after reinstallation.  Potential solutions include checking system compatibility, updating graphics drivers, reinstalling the app, and verifying OS integrity.

common_issues.title: Pieces OS and Ollama Installation Failures Across Platforms
common_issues.description: Users are reporting failures related to Pieces OS and Ollama installation and startup across Linux, Windows, and macOS.  Issues include immediate installation failure dialogs for Ollama on Linux, Pieces OS failing to start on Windows after multiple reinstallations, and unresponsiveness on macOS after the latest Tahoe beta update. Further investigation is needed to determine the root cause and potential solutions across these platforms.

related_issues.title: Ollama Fails to Install on Linux

User reports immediate "Ollama failed to install" diaglog upon clicking install Ollama install button in Pieces desktop app

related_issues.title: Pieces OS not running or responding after latest tahoe beta update
related_issues.text:
Pieces OS not running or responding after latest tahoe beta update
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application, Pieces OS

### Operating System / Platform

macOS

### Your Pieces OS Version

latest

### Early Access Program

- [x] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

it just won't open or respond after the latest tahoe beta update
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

recommendations: Prioritize resolving the 'Pieces OS and application performance issues' as it has the highest frequency and significant user impact. Investigate the root cause of the missing publisher model error and slow performance across Windows, macOS, and potentially Linux.  Optimize application and OS resource usage.

Address the 'Copilot struggles to access and utilize workstream activities' issue by investigating Copilot's interaction with workstreams, especially time range selection and multi-activity access. Ensure consistent performance across macOS and Windows.

Focus on resolving the 'Pieces OS and Ollama Installation Failures Across Platforms' to improve user onboarding. Investigate and fix the installation failures on Linux, startup issues on Windows, and unresponsiveness on macOS after the Tahoe beta update.

Investigate and address the high-activity tickets, especially #716, #315, and #765, as they represent recurring and impactful issues for users.  These tickets relate to LLM code generation, application performance, and workstream integration, respectively.
Improve communication with users on tickets like #759 and #769 related to login/authentication issues. Provide clear instructions and timely updates to minimize user frustration.
